doc.title: TalksForFuture - Fridays For Future
doc.author: Chris Schaumann
doc.excerpt: Increase your knowledge, learn new skills and get inspired…every week new talks with scientists, journalists and activists as well as other international high-level experts.

main.p: Increase your knowledge, learn new skills and get inspired…every week new talks with scientists, journalists and activists as well as other international high-level experts.
